greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A054525(n) * A061397(n).
comment: Equals row sums of triangle A143517. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Aug 22 2008
formula: Dirichlet g.f.: primezeta(s-1)/zeta(s). - _Benedict W. J. Irwin_, Jul 11 2018
a(n) = Sum_{p|n} p*mu(n/p), where p is prime. - _Ridouane Oudra_, Nov 12 2019
example: a(4) = -2 = (0, -1, 0, 1) dot (0, 2, 3, 0), where (0, -1, 0, 1) = row 4 of the Möbius triangle A054525 and (0, 2, 3, 0) = the first 4 terms of A061397.
maple: A061397 := proc(n) if isprime(n) then n; else 0 ; fi ; end: A054525 := proc(n,k) if n mod k = 0 then numtheory[mobius](n/k); else 0; fi ; end: A137851 := proc(n) local k ; add(A061397(k)* A054525(n,k),k=1..n) ; end: seq(A137851(n),n=1..120) ; # _R. J. Mathar_, May 23 2008
program: return add(d*moebius(n//d) for d in divisors(n) if is_prime(d))
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Feb 14 2008
ext: More terms from _R. J. Mathar_, May 23 2008
